rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Each 2x2 area with digits increasing in clockwise direction is marked with a white circle at the intersection. Each 2x2 area with digits increasing in anti-clockwise direction is marked with a black circle at the intersection. All such circles are marked.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each 2x2 area contains four digits of the same parity.
